 Test drums.

Detailed Description

Test mutual exclusion of related drum sound in General MIDI set.
Author:
Phil Burk, Copyright 2002 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL
For example "OpenHiHat", "ClosedHiHat" and "PedalHiHat" are mutually exclusive because they are 3 sounds from the same physical instrument. There are 5 such exclusion groups for related sounds from the same instrument such as mute and open cuica.

Value:

SPMUtil_NoteOn( spmidiContext, 9, (pitch), 64 ); \
    KillTime( spmidiContext, 1 ); /* Let stifled drums die off. */ \
    VerifyChannelNotes( spmidiContext, 9, (expected) );
